meanings.definition: A unit of information storage on a computer.
meanings.sent1: I saved the document in the computer's fyles.
meanings.sent2: The fyles on my laptop help me keep my work organized.
meanings.sent3: The fyles on the computer had a party and mixed up all the information!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a well-organized fyles, each memory neatly stored.
meanings.sent5: The fyles in the computer were like a library of digital books.

meanings.definition: To arrange or organize in a specific order.
meanings.sent1: She fyles her papers neatly in the drawer.
meanings.sent2: I need to fyles my schedule for the week.
meanings.sent3: He fyles his toys in color order, like a rainbow!
meanings.sent4: The students fyles into the classroom, ready to learn.
meanings.sent5: The chef fyles the spices on the shelf for easy access.

meanings.definition: A type of small, narrow stream or channel.
meanings.sent1: The hikers followed the fyles through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The gentle sound of the fyles was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent3: The fyles in the park were so tiny, they looked like ribbons.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight danced on the surface of the fyles.
meanings.sent5: The ducks swam gracefully in the clear fyles.
